sqlMap.select: select bls_book_seq.nextval from dual
select distinct(isbn), img from BLS_BOOK where isbn = #isbn#

select bookno, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject, p.publisher, img from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and bookno=#bookno#

select distinct(isbn), title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, img, s.subject, p.publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and title = #title#

select page, bookno, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher from (select ceil(rownum/10) as page, bookno, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher from (select bookno, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno order by bookno asc)) where page = #page#
select count(distinct(isbn)) from BLS_BOOK

select no,page, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher, s_isbn as isbn from (select rownum as no,ceil( rownum /5) as page, title, writer,loc, b_subject as subject, b_publisher as publisher, s_isbn from (select distinct(isbn) as s_isbn, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject as b_subject, p.publisher as b_publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno)) where page = #pageNum#

select distinct(isbn), title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, img, s.subject, p.publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and isbn=#isbn#
sqlMap.update: update BLS_BOOK set title=#title#, writer=#writer#, cont=#cont#, loc=#loc#, subjectNo=#subjectNo#, publisherNo=#publisherNo#, outputDate=to_date(#outputDate#,'YYYY/MM/DD') where isbn=#isbn#
sqlMap.select: select publisherNo from bls_book_pbs where publisher=#publisher#
select subjectNo from bls_book_sbj where subject=#subject#
select count(isbn) from BLS_BOOK
select bls_book_comment_seq.nextval from dual
select no, isbn, writer, bookcomment, score from (select rownum as cno, no, isbn, writer, bookcomment, score from BLS_BOOK_COMMENT where isbn=#isbn# order by no desc ) where cno <= 5
select round(avg(score),1) from BLS_BOOK_COMMENT where isbn=#isbn#

select num, c_isbn, average,title, writer, publisher, subject, loc from ( select rownum as num ,c_isbn, average,title, writer, publisher, subject, loc from( select distinct(c_isbn), average, title, writer, publisherNO, subjectNO, loc from bls_book b,( select num, isbn as c_isbn, average from ( select rownum as num, isbn, average from ( select isbn, average from ( select isbn, round(avg(score),1) as average from bls_book_comment c group by isbn)order by average desc))where num<6)where b.isbn=c_isbn) b, bls_book_sbj s, bls_book_pbs p where b.publisherNo=p.publisherNo and b.subjectNo = s.subjectNo order by average desc) where num<6

select num, c_isbn, average,title, writer, publisher, subject, loc from ( select rownum as num ,c_isbn, average,title, writer, publisher, subject, loc from( select distinct(c_isbn), average, title, writer, publisherNO, subjectNO, loc from bls_book b,( select num, isbn as c_isbn, average from ( select rownum as num, isbn, average from ( select isbn, average from ( select isbn, round(avg(score),1) as average from bls_book_comment c group by isbn)order by average desc))where num<6)where b.isbn=c_isbn) b, bls_book_sbj s, bls_book_pbs p where b.publisherNo=p.publisherNo and b.subjectNo = s.subjectNo and subject=#subject# order by average desc) where num<6
select subject from BLS_BOOK_SBJ where subjectNo > 0
select * from BLS_BOOK_PBS
select * from BLS_BOOK_SBJ

select bookNo, title, publisher, loc, bookState, term, (select '연체' from dual where term >7) as overdue from( select b.bookNo, b.title, p.publisher, b.loc, b.bookState, ceil(rownum/#num#) as page, ( select (to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')-to_char(rentalDate,'yyyymmdd')) from bls_book_rental r where r.bookNo = b.bookNo and r.returnDate is null) as term from bls_book b, bls_book_pbs p where b.publisherNo=p.publisherNo) where page=#nowPage#
select count(*) from bls_book

select b.bookNo, b.title, p.publisher, b.loc, b.bookState , ( select 'ok' from bls_book b, bls_book_reserve r where b.bookNo = r.bookNo and r.memberId = #memberId#) as idState from bls_book b, bls_book_pbs p where b.isbn=#isbn# and b.publisherNo=p.publisherNo
sqlMap.update: update bls_book set bookState=#state# where bookNo=#bookNo#
sqlMap.delete: delete from bls_book_reserve where bookNo=#bookNo# and memberId=#memberId#
sqlMap.select: select memberId from bls_book_reserve where memberId=#memberId# and bookNo=#bookNo#
sqlMap.update: update bls_book_rental set returnDate=sysdate where bookNo=#bookNo# and returnDate is null
sqlMap.select: select * from bls_book_pbs where publisher like '%' || #publisher# || '%'
sqlMap.update: update BLS_BOOK set publisherNo=0 where publisherNo = #publisherNo#
sqlMap.select: select * from bls_book_sbj where subject like '%' || #subject# || '%'
sqlMap.update: update BLS_BOOK set subjectNo=0 where subjectNo = #subjectNo#

select no, page, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher, s_isbn as isbn from (select rownum as no,ceil( rownum /5) as page, title, writer,loc, b_subject as subject, b_publisher as publisher, s_isbn from (select distinct(isbn) as s_isbn, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject as b_subject, p.publisher as b_publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and publisher like '%' || #value# || '%')) where page = #page#

select count(*) from (select distinct(isbn) as s_isbn, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject as b_subject, p.publisher as b_publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and title like '%' || #value# || '%')

select no,page, title, writer,loc, subject, publisher, s_isbn as isbn from (select rownum as no,ceil( rownum /5) as page, title, writer,loc, b_subject as subject, b_publisher as publisher, s_isbn from (select distinct(isbn) as s_isbn, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject as b_subject, p.publisher as b_publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and writer like '%' || #value# || '%')) where page = #page#

select count(*) from (select distinct(isbn) as s_isbn, title, writer, cont, isbn ,loc, s.subject as b_subject, p.publisher as b_publisher from BLS_BOOK b, BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where b.subjectno = s.subjectno and b.publisherno = p.publisherno and writer like '%' || #value# || '%')

select outputDate,isbn, newbook, title, writer, subject, publisher from ( select outputDate, ceil(rownum/5) as page , isbn, newbook, title, writer, subject, publisher from ( select outputDate, isbn, newbook, title, writer, subject, publisher from ( select distinct(b.isbn), trunc (sysdate-outputDate) as newbook, b.title, b.writer, s.subject, p.publisher, to_char(b.outputDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as outputDate from bls_book b , BLS_BOOK_PBS p, BLS_BOOK_SBJ s where s.subjectNo=b.subjectNo and p.publisherNo=b.publisherNo)where newbook <30 order by newbook asc)) where page=#pageNo#
